name: Hard More "All My Children" ! Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: How did Josh Madden find out who really murdered Greg Madden?
questions.correct: Zach told him when he was drugged
options: Kendall let it slip at Thanksgiving dinner
Jamie told him to get back at Tad
Dixie told him at the Chandler Mansion
questions.explanation:
Zach told him when he was drugged.

	As we know, Tad Martin was responsible for Greg Madden's coffin death.  Josh and Ryan drugged Zach to find out what he knew about the Fusion murders.  It was revealed by Zach after the truth serum kicked in that Tad had killed the man he knew to be his father.

questions.text: What was the signature of the Satin Slayer?
questions.correct: white gardenia and a white satin ribbon
options: white satin ribbon and a red rose
red rose and a red satin ribbon
pink rose and  a white satin ribbon
questions.explanation:
white gardenia and a white satin ribbon.

	Simone was the first victim of the Satin Slayer.  Her body was placed neatly on the fusion floor with a white gardenia in her hair and a white satin ribbon woven through her fingers.

questions.text: What was the drug that was discovered by Aidan in Zarf's hotel room?
questions.explanation:
estrogen.

	Zarf came out of the closet as a transgender lesbian.  He was taking estrogen to help himself transition into Zoe.

questions.text: What was the name of the former Fusion attorney that had shown back up in Pine Valley and became a suspect for the murders of Simone and Erin?
questions.explanation:
Kenny Adler.

	Kenny Adler claimed to be a former friend of Simone.  He was distraught over her death and tried to be supportive to the rest of the Fusion family.  However, Amanda discovered several photos of the women of Fusion in his wallet and felt he might have been the murderer.

questions.text: What was the name of Julia's friends that were killed following a car crash on Christmas Eve?
questions.explanation:
Jim and Linda.

	Jim and Linda had known Julia when she was in hiding while she was in the witness protection program.  Julia contacted them and explained why she had left so abruptly and the trouble that she had been in.  Jim and Linda came to Pine Valley for a visit and ended up losing their lives as a result of an auto accident.

questions.text: What was the name of Julia's friend Linda's daughter?
questions.explanation:
Kathy.

	When Jamie and Julia came upon the wreck and discovered that Jim and Linda were the passengers she had no idea that they had a daughter.  Jim died shortly after the accident, but Linda lingered on for a few weeks.  She wanted Julia to be Kathy's permanent guardian in case she passed away.

questions.text: Which couple got arrested on New Year's Eve of 2006?
questions.explanation:
Sean and Colby.

	Sean Montgomery and Colby Chandler wanted a night out to celebrate because they thought they had worked their magic and gotten Jack and Erica back together.  They falsely presented themselves to a limo driver and were off for New York City when they were caught.  They were taken to court and given community service for their actions.

questions.text: What name did the "R" stand for on the letters that were written to Zach's mother?
questions.explanation:
Raymond.

	When Josh injected Zach with the truth serum, Zach began to have memories of the night that his mother died.  He soon realized that he remembered the name of the man that had been involved with his mother.

questions.text: What was the name of Spike's first nanny?
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	Rachel had been Spike's nanny since he was born.  She also helped to look after Annie's daughter, Emma.

questions.text: Which of the following jobs did Josh Madden NOT have during 2006?
questions.explanation:
Music producer.

	The ever versatile Josh Madden worked as an ER doctor for PVH, a cosmetic consultant for Fusion, and as Erica Kane's producer for her talk show "New Beginnings".
